ingredients.content: 800 g boned pork belly meat, cut into pieces (5 cm)
2 sprigs fresh coriander, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place ginger into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add all remaining ingredients, except coriander, to mixing bowl and cook <b>45 min/100°C//speed <b>.

Stir with aid of spatula and cook for a further <b>15-20 min/100°C/speed <b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>, until meat is tender and sauce is slightly thickened. Garnish with coriander just before serving.
